messages.text: s/http_xmpp_server_ports/sync_server_ports/

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: How about "Sign into sync and verify that it was successful."?

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: This should be done by tests based on how long they need to run. Remove from here and make sure that every test that enables sync has a larger timeout. If it's a single sync cycle, 1 minute should be sufficient. If a test involves several sync cycles, 2 minutes might be needed.

messages.author: Nirnimesh
messages.text:
This should not apply to the rest of the tests in this test case.

Move your test to another test case, in the same file, and define ExtraChromeFlags only there

messages.author: Nirnimesh
messages.text: append to pyauto.PyUITest.ExtraChromeFlags(self). Don't override it

messages.author: Nirnimesh
messages.text:
this will not work when running the full suite.
This will not even be called.
